actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a refundable credit against income tax liability for increases in social security taxes resulting from increases in social security tax rates effective after December 31, 1977.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow employers and employees an income tax credit for a portion of the social security taxes paid during the taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a refundable credit against income tax liability for increases in social security taxes resulting from increases in social security tax rates effective after December 31, 1977.
